title: "it wasn't the wrong play i was trying to steal baron."
body:
On a champion with no burst damaging ability that can contest with smite's damage.

Against an enemy that has no reason to panic smite as Sejuani is still near full health and baron is almost dead.

But because sometimes you get lucky clearly it's the right play to suicide in for the small chance you'll steal it when the majority of the time you'll just die and leave us down a player while they destroy our objectives.

Xin did nothing wrong and he was in the right to rage at his team.
